metadata.name: morpho_solana
metadata.description: Morpho Blue lending protocol on Solana

errors.name: Unauthorized
errors.msg: Caller is not authorized to perform this action

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero

errors.name: InvalidInput
errors.msg: Cannot specify both assets and shares

errors.name: PositionNotEmpty
errors.msg: Position is not empty, cannot close

errors.name: OracleInvalidProgram
errors.msg: Oracle return data from unexpected program

errors.name: IrmInvalidProgram
errors.msg: IRM return data from unexpected program

errors.name: FlashLoanNotRepaid
errors.msg: Flash loan not repaid within transaction

fields.name: is_revoked
docs: Revocation flag (once revoked, cannot be re-enabled without new account)

fields.name: market_id
docs: Unique market identifier (keccak256 hash of parameters)

fields.name: collateral_decimals
docs: Collateral token decimals (cached for gas savings)

fields.name: loan_decimals
docs: Loan token decimals (cached for gas savings)

fields.name: total_supply_assets
docs: Total loan tokens supplied (increases with interest)

fields.name: total_borrow_assets
docs: Total loan tokens borrowed (increases with interest)

fields.name: pending_fee_shares
docs: Accumulated fee shares owed to fee_recipient

fields.name: flash_loan_lock
docs: Flash loan lock (non-zero means flash loan in progress)

types.name: Position
docs: User position in a specific market

fields.name: supply_shares
docs: Supply shares (earns interest via share appreciation)

fields.name: borrow_shares
docs: Borrow shares (owes interest via share appreciation)

fields.name: collateral
docs: Collateral does not earn interest in Morpho Blue

fields.name: owner
docs: Protocol owner (can transfer ownership, manage settings)

fields.name: fee_recipient
docs: Receives protocol fees from all markets

fields.name: paused
docs: Global pause flag - stops all user operations across all markets

fields.name: lltv_count
docs: Number of enabled LLTVs (active count in the array)

fields.name: enabled_lltvs
docs: Fixed-size array for predictable account size

fields.name: enabled_irms
docs: Fixed-size array for predictable account size
